reviews.review_msg: Great prof, fun class. Lots..lots of reading

This course was his first delivered online. The timeline of getting recorded lectures was sporadic. He prepares minimal slides for his lectures so you need to pay close attention to what he says. The major assignments were all due at the end of the semester, which made it hard to know how he grades. Turns out he has very high expectations.
Difficult class, but Samir made it super interesting. Definitely not a clear-cut syllabus, so it's important to attend lectures and take the time to understand the material.
